title: Please allow me to disable mission notifications
body:
Hi I play league of legends, but the missions are very annoying. I never cared about missions and I never will. Please add a check box to disable all notifications about missions I hate them.

--> Right next to esports disable (MY FAVORITE OPTION) please add the option to block all notifications about missions.

I literally feel like stabbing myself in the eyeball every time I am interrupted by these stupid things and it LITERALLY IS WASTING MY TIME IDGAF about missions!

replies.body: Y'know, I'm actually surprised myself that this isn't a feature yet. I feel you bro, those popup dings can get pretty tilting pretty quick. I'd do my best to get this changed, but they don't take suggestions from poros all that often. I'd suggest you post this over in Client Discussion to make sure the devs see your idea!
